Plot: Follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must master all four elements and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water Tribes and the Earth Kingdom.
Title: The Last Airbender
Actors: Noah Ringer, Dev Patel, Nicola Peltz, Jackson Rathbone
tomatoConsensus: The Last Airbender squanders its popular source material with incomprehensible plotting, horrible acting, and detached joyless direction.
